column5: A buddy of mine that has a commercial fishing license for Great Slave Lake brough me a couple of nice chunks of lake trout fer eats. The 2 chunks he gave me made up the latter 2/3 of one fillet.  The first chunk went on the BBQ last week.  This:    Became this X2:    Tonight I carved up the bigger piece.  This:    Became this and another baggie in the fridge for later this week:
That's a big chunk of trout!
Any 3 foot tape worms in it?
